title.narrative: Creating structures for rural youth leader’s mobilization, capacitating, and mentoring for more effective execution of their policy making and development roles within the Uganda Local Government system – a pilot in Yumbe and Mayuge districts.

description.narrative: Our project’s overall aim is to pilot and develop a grassroots based structure for mobilization, capacitating, mentoring and long-term motivation of youth leaders and youth policy makers at the lower local government level (parish & sub county) in Uganda, in understanding how; Local Governments operate, what their roles as leaders in this system are, understanding processes around budget allocations, decision making, and how one gets youth issues into the decision/policy agenda, as well as advocacy for & influence of policy.
